scenes.description: You're standing in front of the door to the locker room. It's your first time here since joining the company.

You slide the door open and timidly poke your head in.
Jim McHeel: "Way to be on time, kid"

commands.label: Ignore Jim and walk to locker

scenes.description:
Jim McHeel grabs you by the shoulder and spins you around
Jim McHeel: "HEY! You got a hearin' problem, boy?"

Jim McHeel: "You'd damn well better apologize boy. Now pick up my hat."
Jim McHeel throws his hat on the ground at your feet.

Jim McHeel: "That's a good boy. Now, put it on my head. GENTLY."
Jim McHeel throws his hat on the ground at your feet.

The locker room goes mostly quiet. Small chuckles can be heard.
Jim McHeel: "Kid... You. Will. Regret. This."

Tim Bookerman walks in clutching a piece of paper.
Tim Bookerman: "McHeel! Get the hell out to the ring, your music is already playing!"

Jim McHeel glares at you, then hurriedly stomps out the door.
